ygData.subject: Re: Quick Question (and we've been down this road before :)  )
ygData.msgSnippet: Erudin Wizard are Crimson, Magician are blue, Enchanters are Yellow. Got very familiar with these colors in my youth in Toxx being an Erudite wizard. Just for
ygData.messageBody:
Erudin Wizard are Crimson, Magician are blue, Enchanters are Yellow.

Got very familiar with these colors in my youth in Toxx being an Erudite
wizard.

Just for kicks (and sentimental attachments) I still have my Crimson Senior
Appr. Robe :)

Torim Solarium
Wizard of E'Ci

On Mon, 15 Nov 1999 12:02:51 -0500 (EST), foo wrote:

> From: foo <marvin@...>
>
> On Mon, 15 Nov 1999, PHAEDRA WHITLOCK wrote:
> > Freeport = Glaring Magenta-Violet
> > From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
> > What towns have what colored robes?
> > Neriak= Dk Red
> > Akanon = Gold
> > Felwithe = ?Green?
>
> Felwithe is green. and Neriak necro guild has a dark purple/black.
>
> Qeynos is blue
> Erudin necro is brown
> Erudin is yellow(i think)
>
> Stannis Starslyder
> Wizard of the Moon
> Innoruuk
>
>
